Posts.Content: After two years of being on Aromasin I bypassed my Dr. And went back to my Encoligist and I am now off it and back on Tamoxifin. The hip pain was taking over my life and that was not acceptable. It feels much better now and I recomend that you do not have to live like that. Take back your life girls....happy with no pain sallymm
Posts.Title: Aromasin sideeffect
